titles.title: A resolution honoring the life, accomplishments, and legacy of Lodi Gyaltsen Gyari.
A resolution honoring the life, accomplishments, and legacy of Lodi Gyaltsen Gyari.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution honors Lodi Gyari's leadership and accomplishments in promoting freedom, human rights, and justice for the Tibetan people. It also calls for a political solution for Tibet that satisfies the legitimate grievances and aspirations of the Tibetan people.
